definition: the Chinese side (in an international venture)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
Zhongfang county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan

sentences.english: China stands ready to earnestly implement the agreement together with Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 中方愿与越方共同努力，认真落实协议。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has demanded that U.S.-led NATO bear all responsibilities for this incident, and the Chinese side will continue to pay close attention to the development of the matter.
sentences.chinese: 中方将继续密切关注情况的发展。

sentences.english: Which side does China think started the war?
sentences.chinese: 中方对谁先发动该战争持何立场？

sentences.english: Do you think China should play the role of an arbitrator in the dispute between India and Pakistan ?
sentences.chinese: 你认为中方是否应该在印巴冲突中充当调解者的角色？

sentences.english: The Chinese called it a coincidence.
sentences.chinese: 而中方称此为一个巧合。

sentences.english: The Chinese side would like to work together with Arab states to compose a new chapter of China-Arab friendly cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 中方愿与阿方共同努力，谱写中阿友好合作的新篇章。

sentences.english: Kumaratunga highly complimented the stance of China.
sentences.chinese: 库马拉通加夫人对中方的这一立场给予高度评价。

sentences.english: Hu said that China supports Equatorial Guinea's efforts in safeguarding its sovereignty and security.
sentences.chinese: 中方支持赤几维护国家主权和安全的努力。

sentences.english: The Chinese side also presented an official note on the matter to the U.S. side.
sentences.chinese: 中方还就此向美方递交了正式照会。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other Chinese companions attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇等中方陪同人员参加会见。

sentences.english: The Guinean government and people thank for China's years of disinterested and generous assistance.
sentences.chinese: 几政府和人民感谢中方多年来给予几的无私慷慨帮助。

sentences.english: He hopes that the mechanism for Asian cooperation dialogue proposed by Thailand will make progress.
sentences.chinese: 中方希望泰方倡导的亚洲合作对话机制能取得进展。

sentences.english: Black boxes make it tough to reverse-engineer the equipment.
sentences.chinese: “黑盒子”手法使得中方难以对设备进行反向开发。

sentences.english: Chinese editorials said South-East Asians should not be hoodwinked by imperialists.
sentences.chinese: 中方各大报纸表示东南亚各国不应让帝国主义哄骗。

sentences.english: Mr. Black is talking with the Chinese importer about inspecting the goods。
sentences.chinese: 布莱克先生与中方进口商就商品检验问题进行洽谈。

sentences.english: China welcomed Vice President Biden for a visit in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 中方欢迎拜登副总统于二0一一年访华。

definition: the Japanese side or party (in negotiations etc)
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
